<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Endpoint for webhook cancellation."}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/pix-api/v2.x/webhook/{chave}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Use this endpoint to cancel webhook

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"examples":{"chave":{"value":"fulano@gmail.com"}},"name":"chave","description":"The DICT key.","schema":{"type":"string"},"in":"path","required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
